creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
When using mod_jk and ajp13 protocol one of my JSP pages falls over with a "null pointer" exception when calling java.util.HashMap. I've tried all different combinations of Sun, IBM jdks and also SSL and non-SSL mode.  The common denominator is ajp13 (ajp12 works fine).

I know this report is vague, let me know if you want any more info, and I'll try to isolate the problem further,
a lost bug shaking a bit
creator: nacho@apache.org
Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
Given that the version of Tomcat isn't identified and there isn't enough
information to duplicate, I'm marking it as "invalid".  Please try a
current version of Tomcat and log a new bug report if you still have a
problem. Thanks.
